description.description: Description of which objects the properties apply to.

seasonalTheme.description: Which seasonal theme the model override should be active for, or null for all. Defaults to null.

areas.description: An array of bounding boxes, region IDs and/or area enums specifying which areas the override should be limited to.

npcIds.description: A set of NPC IDs which the override should apply to.

objectIds.description: A set of object IDs which the override should apply to.

projectileIds.description: A set of projectile IDs which the override should apply to.

graphicsObjectIds.description: A set of graphics object IDs which the override should apply to.

baseMaterial.description: Case-sensitive name of the material to apply to untextured faces.

textureMaterial.description: Case-sensitive name of the material to apply to textured faces.

uvType.description: What to base UV coordinates on for object texturing. Defaults to GEOMETRY.

uvScale.description: A scaling factor to apply to UV coordinates. Defaults to 1.

uvOrientation.description: Extra rotation to apply to UVs with 2048 corresponding to a complete rotation. Defaults to 0.

uvOrientationX.description: Rotation around the X axis, with 2048 corresponding to a complete rotation. Defaults to uvOrientation.

uvOrientationY.description: Rotation around the Y axis, with 2048 corresponding to a complete rotation. Defaults to uvOrientation.

uvOrientationZ.description: Rotation around the Z axis, with 2048 corresponding to a complete rotation. Defaults to uvOrientation.

rotate.description: Counter-clockwise rotation around the up-axis in degrees, where only 0, 90, 180 and 270 are allowed. Defaults to 0. Only works for static scene models.

hide.description: Whether any model this override applies to should be hidden. Defaults to false.

retainVanillaUvs.description: Retain vanilla UVs on already textured areas of the model. Defaults to true.

forceMaterialChanges.description: Apply the override even when model textures are disabled in the config. Defaults to false.

flatNormals.description: Whether flat normals should be used instead of smooth normals. Defaults to false.

upwardsNormals.description: Whether normals should always point directly up. Defaults to false.

hideVanillaShadows.description: Whether the model has fake shadows which should be removed. Defaults to false.

retainVanillaShadowsInPvm.description: Whether the model has fake shadows which are potentially useful for PvM. Defaults to false.

hideHdShadowsInPvm.description: Whether shadow casting should be disabled when Vanilla Shadows is set to 'Prefer in PvM'. Defaults to false.

castShadows.description: Whether the model cast shadows. Defaults to true.

receiveShadows.description: Whether the model receive shadows cast by other objects. Defaults to true.

shadowOpacityThreshold.description: Specify an opacity threshold for shadow casting that better suits the model. Between 0 and 1.

tzHaarRecolorType.description: Specify a type of TzHaar recolor style to apply. Only relevant for the TzHaar area.

inheritTileColorType.description: Whether to inherit color from the overlay or underlay of the tile beneath. Defaults to NONE.

hideInAreas.description: An array of bounding boxes, region IDs and/or area enums specifying where the model should be hidden.

materialOverrides.description: A subset of options can be tweaked separately for specific materials of the model.

description.description: Description of which part of the object these properties apply to.

textureMaterial.description: Case-sensitive name of the material to apply to faces with this texture.

uvType.description: What to base UV coordinates on for object texturing. Defaults to GEOMETRY.

uvScale.description: A scaling factor to apply to UV coordinates. Defaults to 1.

uvOrientation.description: Extra rotation to apply to UVs with 2048 corresponding to a complete rotation. Defaults to 0.

uvOrientationX.description: Rotation around the X axis, with 2048 corresponding to a complete rotation. Defaults to uvOrientation.

uvOrientationY.description: Rotation around the Y axis, with 2048 corresponding to a complete rotation. Defaults to uvOrientation.

uvOrientationZ.description: Rotation around the Z axis, with 2048 corresponding to a complete rotation. Defaults to uvOrientation.

retainVanillaUvs.description: Retain vanilla UVs on already textured areas of the model. Defaults to true.
